Title: Designates water development representatives for each department of environmental conservation region of the state
Summary: Directs the commissioner of economic development to designate representatives for each department of environmental conservation region of the state to serve as the point of contact for municipalities to aid in the acquisition of resources and funding for water projects.
LawCode: Amd ยง100, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to designating water development representatives for each department of environmental conservation region of the state
